peripherals = SensorStream(baudrate=921_600,port="/dev/ttyTHS0")
peripherals.run() # start on switch on, pause on switch off, KeyboardInterrupt to stop
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
peripherals = SensorStream(baudrate=921_600,port="/dev/ttyTHS0")
peripherals.record(max_timeout=2)
print(peripherals.data)
